column5: Not that I want to steal any deep secrets,  Just wondering if anyone might have some news on the Musky front on pigeon this week.  Depths, colors/lure suggestions etc.. I'm heading up to bobcaygeon tomorrow and havn't been on the water yet this year.  Getting my father his first musky HOPEFULLY!
fished 4hrs Tues.  Not a sniff or follow
It's been very windy last few days !!!! And cooler temps as well I have not seen many boats out at all !!!! Not many reports from local bait shop either
Here's hoping the winds calm today, leaving shortly to head up.  Will update this thread when the opportunity presents itself.
